# this is the build file for project CapsLang
# it is autogenerated by the xmake build system.
# do not edit by hand.

# project
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.15.0)
cmake_policy(SET CMP0091 NEW)
project(CapsLang VERSION 1.0.0 LANGUAGES C)
set(CURRENT_COMPILER_ID ${CMAKE_C_COMPILER_ID})

# target
add_executable(caps-mini "")
set_target_properties(caps-mini PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "caps-mini")
set_target_properties(caps-mini PROPERTIES RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/windows/x64/release")
target_compile_definitions(caps-mini PRIVATE
    NDEBUG
)
set_target_properties(caps-mini PROPERTIES C_EXTENSIONS OFF)
target_compile_features(caps-mini PRIVATE c_std_99)
if(CURRENT_COMPILER_ID STREQUAL "MSVC")
    target_compile_options(caps-mini PRIVATE nil)
else()
    target_compile_options(caps-mini PRIVATE -O1)
endif()
if(CURRENT_COMPILER_ID STREQUAL "MSVC")
else()
    target_compile_options(caps-mini PRIVATE -fvisibility=hidden)
endif()
if(CURRENT_COMPILER_ID STREQUAL "MSVC")
    set_property(TARGET caps-mini PROPERTY
        MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY "MultiThreadedDLL")
endif()
target_link_libraries(caps-mini PRIVATE
    kernel32
    user32
    gdi32
)
# private sourcefiles from sourcebatch c.build for target caps-mini
